# menu

**Instance Property**

The menu that is used for the path control’s cells.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var menu: NSMenu? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property overrides the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView] implementation of `menu` and forwards the message to the `NSPathControlCell`.
title: menu
